lead_paragraph: HOWARD--Bernard. He lived life to the fullest. Always the most dapper gentleman. He will be missed by all--especially us. Love: Fiversons, Gershwinds, Bennetts 1/3
snippet: HOWARD--Bernard. He lived life to the fullest. Always the most dapper gentleman. He will be missed by all--especially us. Love: Fiversons, Gershwinds, Bennetts 1/3
